name: AWS KMSKeys Exposed Through Vulnerable VMs
query: vms( where: { securityGroups_SOME: { rules_SOME: { direction: "Inbound" action: "Allow" AND: [ { OR: [ { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" } { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0" } ] } { sourceFromPort_LTE: 22, sourceToPort_GTE: 22 } ] } } iamRoles_SOME: { policies_SOME: { hasIAMPolicyStatement_SOME: { effect: "Allow" } } } } ) { iamRoles { policies { hasIAMPolicyStatement { permissions { isOwnedByIAMAssetType { includesKMSKey {...AssetFragment} } } } } } }
